channel.title: >> My OFFICIAL what not to do on the forums! <<
channel.description:
[i] Hi. Welcome and have fun. I will now be explaining on what NOT to do on the forums. Ever wonder should I do that or this? Or what I shouldn't post, should i post something that is good but might get people mad? All those and more questions will be answered right here! No hassle and it is easy.
Posting: please when you post don't flame or spam I am only accepting posts for people who need [u]help[/u] no one else sorry. If you post and your not asking for help you will be ignored!
Thanks and please post all questions you have, try to be very specific, thanks. -Y0u [/i]

item.title: >> My OFFICIAL what not to do on the forums! <<
item.dc:creator: @Xbox_Modder Xbox Modder
item.description:
@Xbox_Modder wrote:

I doubt people will even ask leeches will just ask…

And they won’t ask if they should make a tutorial they will ask how to do stuff rather then searching…

Read full topic
item.source: >> My OFFICIAL what not to do on the forums! <<

item.title: >> My OFFICIAL what not to do on the forums! <<
item.dc:creator: @y0u_g0t_pk3d y0u g0t pk3d
item.description:
@y0u_g0t_pk3d wrote:

Actually its for any type of help for this FORUM not moparisthebest (thats a lame forum lol)

for an example would be someone says:

" oh i want to make a mod island but i think ppl will get mad and flame my thread. y0u what should i do?!?!?!!?@!?@!?@!?@ help meeeeeeeeeeee "

Read full topic
item.source: >> My OFFICIAL what not to do on the forums! <<

item.title: >> My OFFICIAL what not to do on the forums! <<
item.dc:creator: @Xbox_Modder Xbox Modder
item.description:
@Xbox_Modder wrote:

Don’t do this…

And by this I mean post stuff in the wrong section…

This shouldn’t go on www.moparisthebest.com it should go on www.moparisthebest.com…

Unless it is about a certain thing such as asking for something before searching etc…

That would go in the Download/Tutorials section I guess…

But whatever I’ll see what it is about.

Read full topic
